name: Tamara In The Forsaken Dungeon
description:
The Story

Tamara was on her way back to town when she stumbled upon a forsaken dungeon in the middle of the forest. She decided to explore that dungeon out of sheer curiosity.

The Gameplay

Tamara In The Forsaken Dungeon is a third-person adventure, dark atmospheric puzzle game

Features:
-Explore a beautifully designed interactive dungeon
-A beautiful female protagonist that is professionally voice-acted by a female actress
-Multiple endings based on your choices
-An easy-to-pick-up game that rewards your smart thinking
-A cryptic story presented within a very immersive dark atmospheric game
-A single player third-person adventure game with platforming and puzzles
-Sexy 3D female characters
